solution_line_template: Jackson gets a total of {jackson_per_day}x{num_days}= <<{jackson_per_day}*{num_days}={jackson_total}>>{jackson_total} fishes after the competition.
Jonah gets {jonah_per_day}x{num_days}= <<{jonah_per_day}*{num_days}={jonah_total}>>{jonah_total} fishes after the competition.
And George was able to get {george_per_day}x{num_days}=<<{george_per_day}*{num_days}={george_total}>>{george_total} fishes after the competition.
Therefore the total fishes they were able to get for their team is {jackson_total}+{jonah_total}+{george_total}= <<{jackson_total}+{jonah_total}+{george_total}={team_total}>>{team_total}.
